text:
I found it/ In that alley yard/ By the empty lot.

/ I don’t wanna move it.

/ I'll just snap, click,/ And keep it/ In a square frame/ Til the day my followers fade.

/ I need to show them how beauty/ Survives.

/ Forget the/  Barbed wire hooks/  Beaten shoe husks/  Compact syringe/  Urine-stain stench/  Makeshift tent and/  Another nauseating/  Needle.

/ Cause it’s 5:45 on a Tuesday/ And those dusk-lit vines/ Cradle the most/ Stunning rose./
